mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.name ,a.insertDate ,a.updateDate ,a.delNy ,(select count(aa.seq) from code aa where aa.codeGroup_seq = a.seq) as seqCount
FROM codegroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO codeGroup( name, insertDate, updateDate, delNy )VALUES( #{name}, now(), now(), 0 )

SELECT a.seq ,a.name FROM codegroup a WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
